page.title: 03ATTITUDES
page.content: Attitudes Local people were found to be very contented with life in the area. They enjoy "the peaceful rural atmosphere" and "friendly village life". They enjoy the slow pace of life and the freedom, peace and quiet which the space and beauty of the countryside gives. "Offcomers" (recent arrivals) see the area in very similar terms and see the local people as being "very pleasant and friendly". THere is some feeling among local people that "Offcommers" either want "to take over" the running of local affairs or that they are not interested in village life.
